synopsis.text: Sanzein Chitose, a high school student, finds himself in an unusual living situation with five of his teachers, who he affectionately refers to as his mothers. These women, each with their own unique quirks and professions, range from a classical writing expert with exceptional housewife skills to a mad scientist. While this might sound like a dream come true for some, for Chitose, it's a daily battle to navigate their overwhelming affection and constant attention, both at home and school. To make matters more complicated, a mysterious girl named Nagatsuki Kuron moves in next door, sparking a new sibling rivalry. Kuron's desire to claim one of his "mothers" for herself adds an unexpected twist to Chitose's already chaotic life. Will Chitose be able to handle this new challenge, or will maternal instincts run wild? Join Chitose in this heartwarming and hilarious journey to find out!
